about.license: BSD 2-Clause and triangle.[c,h] license, which is non-free for commercial use
about.summary: Non-interactive generation of multi-corner quasi-orthogonal grids inside simply connected polygonal regions.

index.license: BSD 2-Clause and triangle.[c,h] license, which is non-free for commercial use
index.name: gridgen

name: gridgen
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "1.51.2" %}
{% set commit = "7a4a5918e5e2147007cb4830d6f0f24e85db6cba" %}

package:
    name: gridgen
    version: {{ version }}

source:
    fn: {{ commit }}.tar.gz
    url: https://github.com/sakov/gridgen-c/archive/{{ commit }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 5a47e5299316269b85a4fdfe01b8cc42e5422176b83767826c3a7d7cc982bad4

build:
    number: 1
    skip: True  # [win]

requirements:
    build:
        - gridutils
    run:
        - gridutils

test:
    commands:
        - gridgen -h
        - conda inspect linkages -n _test gridgen  # [not win]

about:
    home: https://github.com/sakov/gridgen-c
    license: BSD 2-Clause and triangle.[c,h] license, which is non-free for commercial use
    summary: 'Non-interactive generation of multi-corner quasi-orthogonal grids inside simply connected polygonal regions.'

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - ocefpaf
